abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter will continue his crash course on United States military operations in Middle East with closed-door meeting in Kuwait; will meet with officials who are spearheading fight against Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Ashton B. Carter will hold a closed-door conference on Monday in Kuwait, where he is scheduled to meet with senior American military and diplomatic officials who are leading the fight against the Islamic State.

headline.main: Mideast Crash Course for the New Defense Secretary
headline.print_headline: Mideast Crash Course for the New Defense Secretary
